長期入院: (ちょうきにゅういん) - long-term hospitalization
長期国債: (ちょうきこくさい) - long-term national bond
長期戦: (ちょうきせん) - drawn-out (protracted) war or contest
長期計画: (ちょうきけいかく) - long-range plan
長期貸付金: (ちょうきかしつけきん) - long-term loans
長期金利: (ちょうききんり) - long-term interest rate
長期間: (ちょうきかん) - extended period of time; prolonged; long-range
長机: (ながづくえ) - long desk; long table
長板: (ながいた) - instrument used in tea ceremony
長柄: (ながえ) - long handle; long-handled spear; long shaft
長柄刀: (ながえがたな) - long, two-handed sword
長歌: (ながうた) - traditional Japanese poem with verses of five and seven morae repeated at least three times, usu. ending with a verse of seven; (ながうた only)  long epic song with shamisen accompaniment (developed in Kyoto in the late 16th century)
長水路: (ちょうすいろ) - swimming pool lane which is longer than 50 meters
長汀曲浦: (ちょうていきょくほ) - (yoji) long stretch of winding beach
長江: (ちょうこう) - Yangtze River; Changjiang River
長煙管: (ながぎせる) - long kiseru (type of tobacco pipe)
長煩い: (ながわずらい) - long illness; protracted illness
長熨斗: (ながのし) - stretched dried abalone (used as a betrothal gift)
長物: (ながもの) - something long; useless things/white elephant/boondoggle
長男: (ちょうなん) - eldest son (may be the only son); first-born son
長目: (ながめ) - (ant: 短め) longish; moderately long
長目に: (ながめに) - at the long end (e.g. hold); on the long side (e.g. cut)
長着: (ながぎ) - long (i.e. ankle-length) tradional Japanese garment (esp. a kimono)
長短: (ちょうたん) - length; long and short/advantages and disadvantages/pluses and minuses/strong and weak points/merits and demerits
長篇小説: (ちょうへんしょうせつ) - full-length novel
長篠の戦い: (ながしののたたかい) - Battle of Nagashino
長簀鯨: (ナガスクジラ) - fin whale; finback (whale); razorback whale (Balaenoptera physalus)
長粒米: (ちょうりゅうまい) - long grain rice
長精度浮動小数点数: (ちょうせいどふどうしょうすうてんすう) - long precision floating point number
長続き: (ながつづき) - permanence/continuation/long-lasting; to last a long time/to continue/to keep at something for a long time
長編小説: (ちょうへんしょうせつ) - full-length novel
長編映画: (ちょうへんえいが) - feature film
長老教会: (ちょうろうきょうかい) - the Presbyterian Church
長老派: (ちょうろうは) - Presbyterian Church; Presbyterians
長老派教会: (ちょうろうはきょうかい) - Presbyterian Church
長者: (ちょうざ) - (ちょうじゃ only) millionaire; one's superior/one's elder/one's senior; virtuous and gentle person; (ちょうじゃ only)  female owner of a whorehouse in a post town; (ちょうじゃ only)   chief of a post town
長者番付: (ちょうじゃばんづけ) - (yoji) list of the richest people; list of the very highest income earners; billionaire's list
長者貝: (チョウジャガイ) - Beyrich's slit shell (species of sea snail, Pleurotomaria beyrichii)
長胡椒: (ナガコショウ) - Indian long pepper (Piper longum); longpepper
長脇差: (ながわかざし) - longer type of wakizashi (short sword); gambler
長葱: (ながねぎ) - scallion; shallot; green onion; spring onion
長蛇: (chouda) - long snake; long line (de pessoas, etc.)
長蛇の列: (ちょうだのれつ) - long line; long queue
長螺: (ナガニシ) - perplexed spindle (species of sea snail, Fusinus perplexus)
長袴: (ちょうこ) - long hakama; trailing hakama
長襦袢: (ながじばん) - long, kimono-like garment, made of light fabric and worn under the kimono; under-kimono
長角牛: (ちょうかくぎゅう) - longhorn; long-horned cattle
長講一席: (ちょうこういっせき) - (yoji) (make) a long talk (discourse, lecture)
長足: (ちょうそく) - rapid progress; great strides
長足の進歩: (ちょうそくのしんぽ) - rapid progress (strides)
長距離キャリア: (ちょうきょりキャリア) - long distance carrier
長距離会社: (ちょうきょりがいしゃ) - long distance company
長距離依存: (ちょうきょりいぞん) - long-distance dependency (dependencies)
長距離列車: (ちょうきょりれっしゃ) - long-distance train
長距離打者: (ちょうきょりだしゃ) - {baseb} slugger; heavy hitter
長距離競走: (ちょうきょりきょうそう) - long-distance race
長距離走: (ちょうきょりそう) - long-distance race
長距離走者: (ちょうきょりそうしゃ) - long-distance runner
